attributes.action: Ask Queen Elizabeth II to refuse Royal Assent for Yvette Coopers Bill.
attributes.background: The majority voted to leave the EU and day by day we have been ignored! Now we demand our Queen to refuse Royal Assent to Yvette Coopers Bill. The same MP as proved on her previous flyers that she would never block Brexit. We now Count on our Monach to use her Assent powers.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this was a decision for the Queen and not the UK Government or Parliament.
